Description

Paperboy Games is a small indie studio composed of passionate developers who started to work together in 2021.

History

Paperboy Games is a group of 4 indie game developers who met at University of California, San Diego. They met at their university's game development club, but it wasn't until a last minute game jam project in January 2021 that they actually began working together. The team is currentlty composed of Alex Garza, Aiden Jauffret, Matthew Lawrence, and Leon Yang.

Projects

  • Contract Killer
